title: mod服务端警告信息
author: zxy199628
txt_content:
这个应该是恒久光发电机的警告吧？
 [Server thread/WARN] [FML]: Potentially Dangerous alternative prefix `minecraft` for name `ce_solar`, expected `vrgenerator`. This could be a intended override, but in most cases indicates a broken mod.
 [Server thread/WARN] [FML]: Potentially Dangerous alternative prefix `minecraft` for name `ce_generator`, expected `vrgenerator`. This could be a intended override, but in most cases indicates a broken mod.
复制代码然后还有这个 没有语言文件？
 [Server thread/WARN] [FML]: Missing English translation for FML: assets/fml/lang/en_us.lang
 [Server thread/WARN] [FML]: Missing English translation for buildcraftbuilders: assets/buildcraftbuilders/lang/en_us.lang
 [Server thread/WARN] [FML]: Missing English translation for buildcraftcore: assets/buildcraftcore/lang/en_us.lang
 [Server thread/WARN] [FML]: Missing English translation for buildcraftenergy: assets/buildcraftenergy/lang/en_us.lang
 [Server thread/WARN] [FML]: Missing English translation for buildcraftfactory: assets/buildcraftfactory/lang/en_us.lang
 [Server thread/WARN] [FML]: Missing English translation for buildcraftrobotics: assets/buildcraftrobotics/lang/en_us.lang
 [Server thread/WARN] [FML]: Missing English translation for buildcraftsilicon: assets/buildcraftsilicon/lang/en_us.lang
 [Server thread/WARN] [FML]: Missing English translation for buildcrafttransport: assets/buildcrafttransport/lang/en_us.lang
 [Server thread/WARN] [FML]: Missing English translation for ic2: assets/ic2/lang/en_us.lang
复制代码mod只装了 工业2 恒久光 BC建筑
服务端是 forge1.12.2  2768
想问一下 这个警告影响服务端稳定性嘛 会不会有游玩中造成崩溃的风险

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
缺少语言文件的是缺少英文的
上面的大概不用管
mod开服基本都会刷一大堆奇奇怪怪的警告
这还是比较少x

应该会稳定

replies.author: zxy199628
replies.txt_content:
阴阳师元素祭祀 发表于 2019-8-24 13:42
缺少语言文件的是缺少英文的
上面的大概不用管
mod开服基本都会刷一大堆奇奇怪怪的警告
恒久光发电机的警告很奇怪· 是作者没有遵守命名规范嘛·· 是不是无视掉就好了·····
